tool_description: The API returns a random English word with its definitions.
name: Random English Word
title: Random English Word

api_list.name: Fetch A Random Word
api_list.description: This endpoint returns a random English word with its definitions
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://random-english-word.p.rapidapi.com/random-word"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "random-english-word.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://random-english-word.p.rapidapi.com/random-word"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "random-english-word.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
